channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-39209|2024-10-04T17:31:35.321Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before 5.15.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2023-36540|2024-10-04T17:30:41.001Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Untrusted search path in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before 5.14.5 may allow an authenticated user to enable an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-09-20T14:41:30.868Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-04-09T17:13:08.845Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-08-13T13:31:27.006Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%2C%20inc. -- zoom%20desktop%20client%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.
